title: HR Management Practical Competency Enhancement: Inclusive AI Learning Design and 6Cs Framework Integration for Elementary Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device usage skills and experience in educational administration
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners design inclusive learning environments using AI-based educational tools.
Learners elaborate educational scenarios incorporating elements of the 6Cs framework.

Learners will execute effective collaboration strategies by working with ≥10 virtual team members on an online project (4 weeks) using digital collaboration tools (Zoom, Microsoft Teams, Slack), achieving ≥80% weekly goal completion rate and an average score of ≥4 (on a 5-point scale) in team satisfaction surveys.
Learners analyze learner data to develop and evaluate personalized educational strategies.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
